name: "Pebble Beach" Baby Quilt
description:
This baby quilt has a calming color palette of white, tan and grey fabrics, making it an ideal gift for parents who don't want to find out the gender of their baby pre-birth, or for a nursery with a neutral color scheme. 

The hand quilting runs vertically on the left side, with repeating semi-circular patterns forming around the circular, hand-appliqued 'pebbles' to emulate waves on the right. The backing and binding are the same plain white fabric as the front.

Measures approximately 32" x 42"

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand
Hand Applique

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand.

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: "Little Lady Olive's Liberty" Baby Quilt
description:
Custom Piece - SOLD

This was designed and made for the first child of an English couple living in New York. I used Liberty of London fabrics and the UK flag for inspiration, and hand appliqueing methods to sew it together. Every visible stitch on this quilt was done by hand, with the end result echoing the shapes within the flag. The quilted pattern is really highlighted on the plain back. 

The baby's name, month, day and year of her birth was hand embroidered on the back using chain stitch.  

Price on request for similar styles

Measurements: 32" x 42"

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand.

name: "Stripes and Flowers" Baby Quilt
description:
The traditional style of this Log Cabin baby quilt gets a dose of modern femininity from the color palette of grey, white and blue, punctuated with a vibrant mustard-hued center square. 

Measures approximately 32" x 42"

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand. 

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: "Blue Log Cabin" Baby Quilt
description:
This baby quilt takes advantage of the traditional Log Cabin pattern and uses a calming color palette of white, blue and grey fabrics. It has a plain white backing, and is finished with a navy-colored binding. 

Measures approximately 32" x 42"

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand. 

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: "Little Blue Stripe" Child's Quilt
description:
This bright, fresh-looking quilt has elements of both modern and vintage styles. The crisp white fabric on the front is balanced by a blue striped fabric on the back that resembles Ticking, a traditional fabric used for mattresses and pillows. 

Measures approximately 38" x 54"

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand. 

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: "Beach House" Child's Quilt, with toy
description:
Designed and made with a sunny, summer beach house in mind, this quilt fits a child’s first single bed. A traveling companion in the same fabrics is included. 

Measurements: 37.5" x 54.5"

All cotton fabrics
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand. Spot clean toy - gentle use only.

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: "Pretty in Pink" Baby Quilt
description:
This quilt was designed to embrace a very girly, pink palette. The back is a solid cream color with a blue binding. 

All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand. 

The child's name and birthdate can be embroidered on the back.

name: New Zealand/US Flag baby Quilt
description:
This is a custom quilt for a New Zealand/American couple who wanted something for their baby that gave a nod to both cultures. The design was based on the New Zealand flag, with the horizontal quilted lines representing the stripes on the US flag.  

The Union Jack (in the top corner) and stars were individually appliqued on, and all of the quilting was done by hand. 

The finished size measures approximately 35” x 45”

Similar custom designs can be ordered.

name: "Not Such a Girly Girl" Child's Quilt
description:
This quilt was a custom piece, and was designed as something to take the baby through to her first single bed. The request was for a more neutral color palette of greens/purples/yellows, which is tied together with a simple green backing. 

The child's name and birthdate were embroidered on the back.

Measurements: 42" x 52” 
All cotton fabrics 
All quilting done by hand

The fabric has been pre-washed. For future cleaning, wash on the most gentle machine cycle, or by hand.

UPDATE: The client was very happy with the end result and said, “The quilt is AMAZING! Thank you so much! It is the best present I’ve given! Ever. Hands down.”
